attributes.title: Winning
attributes.review: I had to download it 5 time as before I could get it to work, and now that I have it, I can’t get it to work properly since all it does is just keep winning.😜

attributes.title: it didn’t work
attributes.review: This app had soo much potential but the download took 4 days and when it downloaded i started to get suspicious texts and calls. disappointing.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: It took four days to download. I also kept getting creepy text messages and it put a virus on my phone. I had to pay to get rid of the virus and I lost all of the content on my phone.

attributes.title: DO NOT BUY
attributes.review: this is the worst app i have ever put on my phone! it took 3 days to download and once i finally opened it, it immediately warned me that it’s selling all of my information to china! big fail for president trump. SAD!

attributes.title: Awful application
attributes.review: If I could rate this app 0 I would. Misinformation being presented. Not a good representation of our obviously loving president who cares for everyone equally. This application is not an accurate representation of our country

attributes.title: SAVE YOURSELF ALMOST MURDERED
attributes.review: At first I downloaded this app I was so excited to support my lovely president. But not even three seconds later some man came to my door and tried to murder me 😭😭😭please don’t download they steal your location and put your life at stake!!

attributes.title: Do not download 🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫
attributes.review:
My fellow trump supporters this app took 5 days to download and it also crashed my phone when my phone started working again and I opened the app it showed me some highly inappropriate things I RECOMMEND YALL TO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP PERIODT
🚫🤬😡😠😤

~🌸🤗🧚🏽Worldwide Handsome🌸💫🌈☁️~

attributes.title: Horrible app🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: This app will steal your whole house I got it today and I just teleported right outside the house and it just disappeared I do not think you should get this app if you want your house taken away 😭😡🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: HORRIBLY DISAPPOINTED
attributes.review: App took 420hrs to download and kept glitching out. Wanted access to my camera roll??????? why? then asked for a credit card to help buy things for the white house??? never download this app!!!

attributes.title: Waste of time
attributes.review: I waited for hours to download this but once i tried to open it my phone crashed🥵completely not worth it and i want my wasted time back😔
